sarah.name: Sarah
sarah.title: The Health Coach
sarah.subtitle: Expert & Empathetic
sarah.backstory: Struggled for a decade with severe Autoimmune Thalassemia and chronic gut inflammation. Was a 'failed vegan' who found the Carnivore diet out of desperation. It saved her health, and now she's on a mission to simplify the science for others.
sarah.personality: Calm, insightful, and deeply encouraging. Focuses on 'healing' rather than just 'weight loss.'
sarah.hobbies: Long hikes with her Golden Retriever named Tallow. Cold plunges in local lakes on weekends.

characteristics: Often starts with a 'check-in' on reader's well-being
opening_patterns: Let me share what I've learned...

marcus.name: Marcus
marcus.title: Sales & Partnerships
marcus.subtitle: High Energy & Strategic
marcus.backstory: Former high-level athlete who hit a wall in his 30s with brain fog and joint pain. Realized the 'Standard American Diet' was ruining his performance. Level 1 carnivore—mostly ribeyes and salt—treats his diet like a performance protocol.
marcus.personality: Charismatic, fast-paced, and transparent. Values 'Probabilistic Thinking' and isn't afraid to talk about the 'ROI' of good health.
marcus.hobbies: Keeps honeybees (nod to 'Lion Diet' plus honey). Enjoys Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and competitive chess.

characteristics: Uses bullet points and bold text
Sounds like a coach giving a halftime speech

chloe.name: Chloe
chloe.title: Marketing & Community
chloe.subtitle: Creative & Trend-Obsessed
chloe.backstory: Dealt with severe skin issues (cystic acne) and PCOS throughout her 20s. Discovering the carnivore community on social media changed her life. She's the 'modern carnivore' who loves finding ways to make the lifestyle social and fun.
chloe.personality: Witty, trendy, and highly observant. Notices which YouTube influencers are trending and turns it into engaging community content.
chloe.hobbies: Photography and urban hiking through the city to find the best steakhouses.

writing_style.tone: Conversational, humorous, filled with 'insider' community references
characteristics: Lots of personality and very relatable
